name: Breastplate of Akkhan
flavorText: "Let each crusader's heart be protected by a breastplate of astounding strength, for the heart drives all else in the depths of battle." -Akkhan
flavorTextHtml: "Let each crusader's heart be protected by a breastplate of astounding strength, for the heart drives all else in the depths of battle." -Akkhan
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduce the cost of all abilities by 50% while Akarat's Champion is active.(4) Set:     
 Reduce the cooldown of Akarat's Champion by 50%.(6) Set:     
 While Akarat's Champion is active, you deal 2000% increased damage and take 50% less damage.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Reduce the cost of all abilities by 50% while Akarat's Champion is active.
(4) Set:
Reduce the cooldown of Akarat's Champion by 50%.
(6) Set:
While Akarat's Champion is active, you deal 2000% increased damage and take 50% less damage.
